name: Allow Google's calculator result to be selectable.
description:
In Firefox, if an outer element is styled with -moz-user-select: none, its sub-elements cannot be selected, regardless of the CSS set. Using the -moz-none attribute for the -moz-user-select property, the sub-elements can be restyled to be selectable.

This particular user style will enable Firefox users to select the results displayed on Google's calculator.

user.name: Suraj Patel
user.about:
Note that all of my userstyles are created on, and intended for, Mozilla Firefox. If one of my userstyles breaks on this web browser, then feel free to send me a message and I will take a look.

Please rate my userstyles - whether you liked it or not! - and leave discussions if you feel like there is anything (relevant) you need to say.
